txt.en: Talk to Dráttur
'A torn cloak? Greyish? Aye, I remember it well. You tell Shálun that he can bring his own clothing to Aboki for repairs from now on. I am no courier, no matter the dwarf.'
DNT - You found a torn cloak!
Return to Thromur
'Welcome back, my friend. You look like you bring news.'
Search the sacks of clothing
Dráttur can be found in Amdân.\n\nYou should ask Dráttur about the torn cloak.
Talk to Aboki
Thromur can be found in Amdân.\n\nReport back to Thromur.
You found a torn cloak!
A few cloaks, but not of the correct colour
Aboki is located in Amdân.\n\nYou should ask Aboki about the torn cloak.
Return to Aboki
Sacks of clothing can be found in Amdân.\n\nYou should search the sacks of clothing for the ripped cloak.

'Aye, it could have come from a cloak. It is nothing special. Just a common weave. There is plenty of ripped fabric here. Go on and look through the sacks, if you like. I haven’t the time to do so for you, obviously.'
'That sack? Dráttur brought that lot round for repair. Ask him and leave me to my work. The day grows short and the piles grow taller and taller.'
'The scrap of cloth that you brought me looks like it could have come from the cloaked figure Zebena thought she saw. Perhaps the tailor, Aboki, can tell you more about the fabric.'
DNT - Search the sacks of clothing
Was the scrap of fabric torn from the fluttering cloak or off the thief? Or could it be some haunted relic of a passing ghost?
Talk to Aboki
Searching the Sacks

'Aye, it could have come from a cloak. It is nothing special. Just a common weave. There is plenty of ripped fabric here. Go on and look through the sacks, if you like. I haven’t the time to do so for you, obviously.'
Aboki is located in Amdân.\n\nYou should bring the scrap of fabric to Aboki.
